title: WSL: Shaw hits four in Manchester City rout, United roar back to deny Spurs
description: Manchester City’s 6-1 win kept them six points ahead of Chelsea, who won 3-0 at Brighton, while Manchester United came from 3-0 down to draw with Spurs
content:
Khadija Shaw’s phenomenal scoring record for Manchester City was extended to 103 goals in all competitions, with a stunning four goals in the league leaders’ 6-1 defeat of Aston Villa.
It was Shaw’s 120th appearance for City in all competitions and t... [3668 chars]

title: East Coast Mainline timetable revamp means more Yorkshire trains
description: Changes include an hourly fast service between Leeds and Sheffield and reduced journey times.
content:
Major changes to train timetables on the East Coast Main Line will mean more services, extra seats and reduced journey times, according to operator LNER.
The rail company said the "transformational" changes, which came into force earlier, meant it wo... [1792 chars]

title: Woltemade’s bizarre own goal hands Sunderland derby spoils over Newcastle
description: Nick Woltemade’s headed own goal gave Sunderland a 1-0 win against Newcastle in a fiery Wear-Tyne derby at the Stadium of Light
content:
Eddie Howe is not the first, and is unlikely to be the last, manager outwitted by Régis Le Bris this season but few are likely to find the experience quite as painful.
Losing this most febrile of local derbies is a big deal and in past seasons has pr... [4606 chars]

title: Coldplay's Chris Martin surprises couple at Staffordshire wedding by singing their first dance
description: After a bridesmaid asked Coldplay to send a congratulatory message, Chris Martin took it one step further, turning up at the wedding venue to perform. | ITV News Central
content:
Chris Martin surprises the newlyweds by singing 'All My Love' for their first dance. Credit: Alex Brown

title: Taylor Swift Eras Tour member nearly faints after finding out share of bonus
description: The record-breaking Eras Tour concluded in December 2024
content:
Taylor Swift’s generosity to her Eras Tour team has left one employee speechless over the massive bonus and handwritten note the singer gave him.
